com.ctre

Class PigeonImu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ctre.CtreCanMap
      • com.ctre.PigeonImu

  • public class PigeonImu
extends CtreCanMap
    Pigeon IMU Class. Class supports communicating over CANbus and over ribbon-cable (CAN Talon SRX).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PigeonImu.CalibrationMode
      Various calibration modes supported by Pigeon.
      static class  PigeonImu.FusionStatus
      Data object for holding fusion information.
      static class  PigeonImu.GeneralStatus
      Data object for status on current calibration and general status.
      static class  PigeonImu.ParamEnum
      General Parameter Enums
      static class  PigeonImu.PigeonState
      Overall state of the Pigeon.
      static class  PigeonImu.StatusFrameRate
      Enumerated types for frame rate ms.

        public PigeonImu(int deviceNumber)
        Create a Pigeon object that communicates with Pigeon on CAN Bus.
        Parameters:
        deviceNumber - CAN Device Id of Pigeon [0,62]

      • PigeonImu

        Create a Pigeon object that communciates with Pigeon through the Gadgeteer ribbon
        Parameters:
        talonSrx - cable connected to a Talon on CAN Bus.

        public double GetCompassHeading()
